---
# TODO.md Template

Use this template to authorize work items for AI execution.

## TODO

### [Task Description]
- **LLD Reference**: LLD.md - "[Section Name]"
- **Dependencies**: [Other TODO items, or "None"]
- **Status**: TODO

### [Another Task]
- **LLD Reference**: LLD.md - "[Section Name]"
- **Dependencies**: None
- **Status**: TODO

## DONE

[Completed items are moved here]

### [Completed Task]
- **LLD Reference**: LLD.md - "[Section Name]"
- **Status**: DONE

## Notes

- Each TODO item must reference a specific LLD section
- Dependencies must be completed before starting dependent items
- Only one TODO item is executed at a time
- Status is updated to DONE when complete
